name: Yogurt The Fox 0.1.1 DEMO (April Fools Joke)
name_original: Yogurt The Fox 0.1.1 DEMO (April Fools Joke)
description:
Yogurt The Fox 0.1.1 DEMO (April Fools Joke) is a game developed by Blu Day Studios. It was originally released in 2023.
Yogurt The Fox 0.1.1 DEMO (April Fools Joke) is available on Android and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
